page.title: 06Clubs in Bromp on Swale
page.content: TWO POPULAR ACTIVITIES FOR THE BOYS AND GIRLS IN B.O.S ARE 1.THE {DRAMA AND MIME GROUP}IN RICHMOND.WHEN WE ARE THERE WE DO THINGS LIKE PRACTICE FOR A SMALL PLAYLET THAT WE WILL DO FOR THE PARENTS ON A TUESDAY NIGHT.THE LAST PLAYLET WE DID WAS BASED ON CIRCLES AND A FAIRGROUND SCENE.THE TEACHER WHO TEACHES IS CALLED MRS CRADOCK AND SHE KNOWS QUITE A LOT ABOUT DRAMA AND MIMING.NORMALLY WE WORK WITH PARTNERS OR IN A GROUP OF FOUR OR FIVE PEOPLE IN IT.THERE ARE ABOUT THIRTY OF US THAT GO. {2.CUBS} IN CUBS THERE ARE FOUR LEADERS THEY ARE BALLA (MY DAD) RAKSHA SHEARKAN AND THE BOSS OF THEM ALL IS ALKALA. THERE ARE ALSO FOUR SIXIES THEY ARE CALLED RED GREY BLUE AND SECONDERS I AM A SECONDER TOO. WE HAVE TO WEAR A UNIFORM.SOMETIMES AT NIGHT WE GO ON SAUSAGE HIKES.
